title: Brooklyn architecture firms are hiring! Here are 16 featured job opportunities
author: Nathaniel Bahadursingh

text: If you're an experienced professional ready for a new architectural career opportunity in Brooklyn, this newest edition of our curated job picks from Archinect Jobs is for you. Look below at this selection of 14 featured employers looking to expand with exciting openings for architects, designers, and project managers in the borough. (Interested in the greater New York City area? See who's hiring here.) For helpful guidance on how to get that next job, make sure to check out Archinect's Guide to Job Titles series and our Archinect Tips collection. Steering House Design and Development seeks a Project Architect"Steering House is an established Brooklyn based, high-end residential design, development and construction company looking to hire a Project Architect immediately. The best qualified candidates will also have hands on residential construction project management experience over the full lifecycle of a townhouse gut renovation, or similar. All candidates must be comfortable in a fast-paced, high pressure work environment managing projects with $5m+ budgets each. This position reports to the company’s COO but the success of this role depends heavily upon close collaboration with our entire tight knit management team and amazing clients." Mammoth seeks a Project Designer"Mammoth, a Brooklyn-based Design-Build Studio is seeking a Project Designer (2-5 years experience) to join our team. This is a full-time, in-person position in our Dumbo Studio. Candidate must already be located in New York City. And be legally able to work in the US. We are a growing team and are looking for candidates to contribute positively to our culture & company trajectory. The ideal candidate is a self-motivated, detail-oriented, and a creative individual who values clear and open communication. Please be highly proficient in some combination of AutoCAD, Revit, and Photoshop. Please let us know which you excel in, in your application. NYC experience is preferred." FE seeks a Project Architect"FE is seeking a Project Architect with a minimum of 6 years in professional practice to join our Brooklyn, NY studio. The successful applicant will collaborate closely with the partners and design staff across all aspects of the practice, including both design and management. The position involves taking on a leadership role in structuring and tracking project deliverables, guiding internal reviews, and maintaining regular communication with consultant teams as well as clients. As a Project Architect you will play a key role in ensuring design excellence, technical rigor, and client satisfaction across multiple projects while supporting the Partners in firm operations, staffing, and business development." Prospect Heights Townhouse by Elizabeth Roberts Architecture & Design. Photo: Dustin AkslandElizabeth Roberts Architecture & Design seeks an Intermediate Architect and a Senior Architect Intermediate Architect details: Qualifications include a six-plus years of experience, experience in architectural drafting and detailing, and proficiency with AutoCAD, Rhino, and Adobe Creative Suite. Experience working on high-end residential and hospitality projects, as well as experience with NYC Department of Building and Landmarks filing drawings is a plus. Senior Architect details: Qualifications include ten-plus years of experience, proficiency with AutoCAD and hand drawing, extensive project management experience, extensive experience with Construction Administration, extensive experience with construction documents and details, experience with historic NYC residential buildings, technical proficiency with both new construction and historic rehabilitation, and excellent interpersonal skills. Chango seeks an Architecture Project ManagerQualifications include ten-plus years of experience, with a focus on high-end single-family residential projects, five-plus years of experience working on projects in and around New York City, proficiency with AutoCAD and Google Suite, experience in project management and managing a team of designers, and excellent communication skills. Austin Victorian by Chango.BATLIBOI STUDIO seeks an Intermediate Architect / DesignerQualifications include three to six years of experience, proficiency with AutoCAD, Revit, Rhino, SketchUp, Adobe Creative Suite, Bluebeam, and Google Suite, experience in space planning and material selection, knowledge of building codes and regulations, and strong communication and presentation skills. Studio Marie seeks a Project Manager"Studio Marie is seeking a Project Manager to work as part of a team, overseeing all aspects of a project from design to construction administration. We are looking for an applicant that is self-motivated, capable of communicating effectively, and managing multiple projects from design through construction. [...] The ideal candidate will be an organized leader with a minimum of 6 years’ experience in the preparation of architectural contract documents, details and specifications." CRÈME / Jun Aizaki Architecture & Design seeks a Furniture DesignerQualifications include three to five years of experience, a degree in Industrial Design, an understanding of hospitality/interior design, and a strong portfolio. The firm is also hiring for an Intermediate Interior Designer \with Hotel Experience and a Senior Interior Designer Role \with Hotel Experience. Nando's by CRÈME / Jun Aizaki Architecture & Design.Studio PHH Architects seeks an Architectural DesignerQualifications include one to three years of experience, proficiency with Rhino, Revit, and Adobe Creative Suite, strong design sensibility and attention to detail, and excellent communication and organizational skills. Bernheimer Architecture seeks Staff Level IV"Bernheimer Architecture is seeking candidates for a senior designer or licensed professional position with a minimum of 7+ years of practical work experience (at “Staff IV” level of the BA Union per current CBA). Applicants must have a strong design sensibility and working knowledge of NYC housing, in particular at least 2+ years of experience on rehabilitation and adaptive reuse projects from the design through construction phases." Andrew Magnes Architecture seeks a Jr Architect"We are looking for a Jr. Architect with 2-3 years of experience, in custom residential design." Qualifications include proficiency with AutoCAD and Rhino, strong communication and collaboration skills, an interest in color, composition, and new materials, and an interest in how buildings and interiors are put together, along with an excitement about detailing. Prospect Park Apartment by Space Exploration Design.Space Exploration Design seeks a Project Manager"Space Exploration is seeking an experienced project manager to oversee multiple new and ongoing projects. Fluency in all aspects of the interior design of complex residential and hospitality projects is a significant advantage. [...] The successful candidate should have at least four years of experience with design and coordination. Nimble design skills and strong construction administration experience is essential. Fluency (or at least familiarity) with code compliance as well as a comfortable understanding of the landscape of NYC-based AHJs is important. Licensure is a plus. Candidates who possess significant experience with complex projects will receive preference for this position." Stefan Beckman Studio seeks a Junior Designer"Stefan Beckman Studio is seeking a talented junior designer to join its team in New York. This position requires strong SketchUp drawing skills, an interest in art and fashion and a familiarity and knowledge of fine furniture. This is a very unique opportunity for a confident, self motivated designer with a broad range of interests. Our projects include set design, prop styling, exhibition design, event design and interior architecture." PorterFanna Architecture seeks an Intern Architect / Designer and a Project Manager Intern Architect / Designer details: "Intern / Designer with a minimum of 1 year experience. Must be able to take direction and use drawing examples, research and creativity to create 3D presentations, walk-throughs, 3D models, produce construction drawings and, moreover, think on their feet. Strong organization skills and work ethic are a must." Project Manager details: "Project Manager / Architect with a minimum of 3 years of experience working in an American architecture office including project management, construction administration, client stewardship and leadership. Strong organization skills and work ethic is a must. (Architectural license is not required)" If you don't already, follow Archinect's Facebook, X, Instagram, Pinterest, and LinkedIn, as well as our dedicated Archinect Jobs Facebook, X, and Instagram feeds.

See who's hiring here.)
